roleset.name: extract money because of misdeed
roleset.note: FINE-V NOTES: Argument ordering suggested by 'charge' and 'bill', class 54.5. (from fine.01-v)
FINE-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from fine.01-n)

example.name: passive, fine and cause
example.text: [Biscayne Securities Corp., of Lauderhill, Fla., and a principal of the firm, Alvin Rosenblum of Plantation, Fla.,]-1 were jointly fined *trace*-1 $20,000 and given 10-day suspensions for allegedly selling securities at unfair prices.
example.arg: for allegedly selling securities at unfair prices

example.name: with agent
example.text: Meanwhile, inside the courtroom, the judge said he would fine attorneys for the two creditors $50 every time they referred to each other with terms such as ``liar'' or ``slime.''
example.arg: every time they referred to each other with terms such as ``liar'' or ``slime

example.name: passive with one arg
example.text: Two firms were expelled from the NASD, three were suspended or barred and nine-1 were fined *trace*-1.

roleset.name: small in terms of particle size, diameter
roleset.note: FINE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on WordNet. (from fine.02-j)

example.name: both args
example.text: My fiance's hair is baby-fine and wavy/wurly.

roleset.name: elegant, high quality, attractive
roleset.note: FINE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on WordNet. (from fine.03-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: I have sent your letter to Barbes; it is fine and splendid, as you are.

example.name: gay and giddy
example.text: Her notions were fine, and her dress was fine; she was gay and giddy and very pretty, and would do nothing all day but read books

roleset.name: alright, ok
roleset.note: FINE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1. Relates to 'finetune.01', although not in terms of the arguments. (from fine.01-j)

example.name: arg1 topic
example.text: If that article represents the final word on " substance " to you , that 's fine with me .
example.arg: If that article represents the final word on "substance" to you

example.name: arg2 topic
example.text: People-1 pretend [*-1] to be fine with it - but their is ignorance deep inside .
